feed.title: My favorite moments
feed.subtitle: Small part of my daily life. Hope it makes you feel better this night.

entry.title: Bakery
entry.content:
After a long working day, i’m sure, you want to eat something sweet, don’t you?

Even if you prefer eat sweets on Sunday morning, you want to see gorgeous piece of cake or maybe it’s one big cookie? Anyway, let’s stop talking about it and go to bake a cake!
entry.summary: After a long working day, i’m sure, you want to eat something sweet, don’t you?

entry.title: Romantic films
entry.content:
Make your mood higher in a bad weather, warm fireplace in a cozy house and keep hugs cute and sweet.

Everybody, who watch romantic comedies and non-comedies get my unprecendal respect!
entry.summary: Make your mood higher in a bad weather, warm fireplace in a cozy house and keep hugs cute and sweet.

entry.title: Hygge
entry.content:
It starts when household all at home, when ginger cookies are on a table and when winter comes and snowfalling down.

Perfect for hygge time is Christmas tree. I can’t wait for Christmas, and you?
entry.summary: It starts when household all at home, when ginger cookies are on a table and when winter comes and snowfalling down.
